description:
Big adventure pants for smaller adventurers. The Mochilero Stretch Pants are made from the same stretchy nylon as the adult's version, with plenty of mobility and weather protection to handle all trail conditions. A hidden internal waist band adjusts to accommodate young ones growing over time.

  • Midweight nylon blend dries quickly
  • DWR finish helps keep these pants cleaner longer
  • UPF 50+ blocks UV during long days under the sun
  • Belt loops and hidden adjustable waistband for a perfect fit
  • Zippered fly with a button closure
  • Articulated knees and gusseted crotch for easy movement
  • 2 jeans-style front pockets and a zippered thigh pocket
name: MEC Mochilero Stretch Pants - Boys' - Youths
